content: i m a large size lady and i wanted to create a poncho that would fit me i had thought of doing it entirely in chenille yarn but it quickly got too heavy and expensive so i went on the hunt for something that matched the chenille i already had i found a burgundy red heart and decided to combine the yarns the soild parts of the poncho are the chenille and the open work is the 4 ply yarn i also added butterfly charms that are randomly worked in the 4 ply sections but neither photo showed them this is one of my first attempts at plus size crochet i consider the pattern easy and would love to hear from anyone who has made it
